thank you for sharing GIANNIS511. i've read #1-5 today. sadly this wasn't the finale of the first storyline (as the marvel solicitation said). but this is truly a great series so far ... gorr has to be one of the most intriguing new villains from marvel in years!

Thanks to the uploader! Movie was OK as i expected it to be! I usually watch all the movies at film.handitrade.com because they have HD's but they didn't have this one so im happy to have piratebay :) Good torrent quality - A9 V9,
